problems.yes: You chose two datasets, and your datasets are for regression/classification. You also described why your datasets are interesting from an ML's perspective. I like that you described the underlying structure of each problem, and provided motivation for why these datasets may produce different results.
problems.no:
You chose two datasets. We also wanted to see some discussion on if your datasets are good for regression/classification related problems. In addition, we wanted to see some discussion on why your datasets are 
interesting from an ML's perspective. Often, adding information such as underlying structure of each problem, and some discussion on motivation for why 
these datasets may produce different results strengthen the quality of reports.
